name: Sprites and Spriggans
description:
A Spriggan challenged you to a dangerous game of elemental dice.

The rules are simple:

Your opponent's elemental cubes carry one of 5 Elements: 

Sprite - Earth - Fire - Water - Air

In order to defeat one of your opponent's elemental cubes you have to make sure that the top of your dice shares the element with your enemy's. Win all 8 rounds to defeat the evil spirit and banish them from your beloved Tavern.

----- Controls----- 

W A S D to control the dice

Q/E to rotate
